title: Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Nights 2 Enhanced Download
description: Return to the city of Neverwinter in Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Nights 2: Enhanced Edition. A dark force sweeps over Faerûn, ravaging everything in its path as though searching for something – something that you now find in your possession . As the Shard-Bearer, only you can stop the King of Shadows and his army from desecrating the land you call home. Will you save Faerûn, or fall victim to the temptation of absolute power? When your actions dictate the fate of the Realms , there are no small choices.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500
